prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a golden crown and a mystical aura.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with sleek purple fur and hypnotic eyes.
Imagine a powerful psychic creature that can read minds and levitate objects.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies wisdom and intelligence with an elegant design.
Design a Pokemon with three distinctive spoons, showcasing its telekinetic powers.
Give me a psychic Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, known for its cunning.
Make a majestic Pokemon with a balance of purple and yellow colors, symbolizing knowledge.
